Elements.Body: Just confirming that we’re meeting at Effy’s before we head downtown,right? I want to get some work done before we go. I got a term paper due the end of this week ughhh.
You can still think about work with all this shit going on?
Sorry that you’ve got to deal with this shit on top of your work…

I guess in a way, it’s comforting to know that in spite of the Nightmares and Dreamweaver and blackout, some things are going to stay the same. And I’d rather not think about all of the people who have disappeared. I mean, I can’t let everything collapse on top of me.

In case you’ve already forgotten what your junior year was like, we’re all stubborn beyond reason, so don’t worry about me. Anyway, if you’re gonna be around, come keep me company. I’ll probably be working in the foyer.
Well, we’re gonna need you so do what you need to do.
Just make sure you’re taking care of yourself.
Instead of being outside with the food and excitement? Yeah, that’s a hard bargain.
Sure, sure. I’ll come bring you something from the carnival.
